mapper.select: select eqCode, eqDetail, eqCapacity, eqType from eqcatalog
select eqCode, eqDetail, eqCapacity, eqType from eqcatalog where eqType=#{eqType}

select subgroup.subGroupName from subgroup join ( select equipments.subGroupCode from ( select eqCode from eqcatalog where eqcatalog.eqType = #{eqType} and eqcatalog.eqDetail=#{eqDetail}) as A join equipments on A.eqCode = equipments.eqCode) as B on subgroup.subgroupCode = B.subgroupCode

select equipments.id, company.companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, A.eqCode, A.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join (select eqCode, eqDetail from eqcatalog where eqcatalog.eqType = #{eqType}) as A on A.eqCode = equipments.eqCode join company on company.companyCode = equipments.companyCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode

select equipments.id, company.companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, A.eqCode, A.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join (select eqCode, eqDetail from eqcatalog where eqcatalog.eqType = #{eqType} and eqcatalog.eqDetail= #{eqDetail}) as A on A.eqCode = equipments.eqCode join company on company.companyCode = equipments.companyCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode

select equipments.id, company.companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, A.eqCode, A.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join (select eqCode, eqDetail from eqcatalog where eqcatalog.eqType = #{eqType} and eqcatalog.eqDetail= #{eqDetail}) as A on A.eqCode = equipments.eqCode join company on company.companyCode = equipments.companyCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode where subgroup.subgroupName = #{subGroupName};

select equipments.id, company.companyCode, site.siteName, uppergroup.groupName, eqcatalog.eqCode, eqcatalog.eqDetail, subgroup.subgroupName, location.location, func.funcLoc, proc.ProcessName, equipments.energyCode1, equipments.energyCode2, equipments.energyCode3 from equipments join company on company.companyCode = equipments.companyCode join site on equipments.siteCode = site.siteCode join eqcatalog on equipments.eqCode = eqcatalog.eqcode join uppergroup on equipments.groupCode = uppergroup.groupCode join subgroup on equipments.subGroupCode = subgroup.subGroupCode join location on equipments.upperLocationCode = location.locationCode join func on equipments.upperFunctionCode = func.functionCode join proc on equipments.upperProcessCode = proc.processCode where equipments.id = ${eqId}
